tutorial.name: Building and Running an Example Application
tutorial.description: You can test that your installation is successful by opening an existing example application project.

tutorial.name: Creating a Qt Widget Based Application
tutorial.description: This tutorial describes how to use Qt Creator to create a small Qt application, Text Finder.

tutorial.name: Creating a Qt Quick Application
tutorial.description: This tutorial uses basic elements and illustrates basic concepts of Qt Quick.

tutorial.name: Qt Quick Components
tutorial.description: This tutorial describes how to use Qt Creator to create a small Qt application, Battery Status, that uses the System Information Mobility API to fetch battery information from the device.

tutorial.name: Qt SDK 1.1: Developing with Nokia's Qt Creator
tutorial.description: Lauri Jääskelä from Forum Nokia gives you a kick-start with Qt SDK 1.1 and Qt Quick.

tutorial.name: Qt SDK 1.1
tutorial.description: Christian D. Kamm, software engineer at Nokia, Qt Development Frameworks, introduces the new features delivered in the Qt SDK 1.1. Christian discusses the capabilities of Qt Quick and the Qt Mobility APIs.

tutorial.name: Qt Quick Elements, Part 1
tutorial.description: In this video Nigel Hietala describes how QML Elements are used. Nigel creates a new Qt Quick based application project using Qt SDK, shows how a basic UI is built using elements and is previewed in the Qt Quick viewer.

tutorial.name: Qt Quick Elements, Part 2
tutorial.description: In this video Nigel Hietala describes how QML Components are created and used. Nigel shows how a reusable Qt Quick component is created by defining a separate QML file.

tutorial.name: Qt Quick Elements, Part 3
tutorial.description: In this video Nigel Hietala describes how to use the States and Transitions of Qt Quick. Nigel creates a simple application using a state to control the visibility of an image when a button is clicked.

tutorial.name: Qt Creator Bootcamp
tutorial.description: All you need to start with Qt Creator - a cross-platform IDE Are you developing cross-platform applications with Qt, but are missing a cross-platform development environment?

tutorial.name: Qt Quick - Rapid User Interface Prototyping
tutorial.description: Skip Flash & PhotoShop. Go straight to Qt Quick! Creating an application with a great user experience is a challenge. Traditionally a lot of effort goes into upfront design where tools such as Flash or PhotoShop are used to prototype ideas.

tutorial.name: Qt Creator! Getting the Most out
tutorial.description: A quick intro plus hidden wonders! In this session, we will provide a very quick introduction to Qt Creator, then dive into the hidden wonders of this powerful and easy-to-use cross-platform Qt IDE.

tutorial.name: Meet Qt Quick
tutorial.description: The fundamental elements behind Qt Quick and how to quickly create fluid, animated user interfaces! Qt Quick is a set of technologies that makes it easier for developers and designers to create modern and attractive UIs.
